title: Gingerbread
ingredients: ['115 g (4 oz) light muscovado sugar', '85 g (3 oz) unsalted butter', '170 g (6 oz) treacle', '85 g (3 oz) plain white flour', '85 g (3 oz) plain wholemeal flour', '55 g (2 oz) rye flour', '1 tsp bicarbonate of soda pinch of salt', '1 tbsp ground ginger', '1 tsp ground mixed spice', '2 eggs', '150 ml (5 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk']
